mxCell.value:
Author: Dr. Mark E. Lehr
Created on April 23rd, 2018, 11:42 AM
Purpose: Project 2 - Simulate a Craps Game.

SYSTEM LIBRARIES:
I/O Objects
C Objects
String
Standard Namespace

USER LIBRARIES:
NONE

GLOBAL CONSTANT:
const float PERCENT=100.0f

FUNCTION PROTOTYPES:
char rollDie
void fileDsp
void scrnDsp
void scrnDsp
SET RANDOM NUMBER SEED

DECLARE VARIABLES:
in;
out;
nGames;
mxThrw,numThrw,lmGames;
SIZE;
wins[SIZE];
losses[SIZE];

INITIALIZE VARIABLES:
 string inName="GameInfo.dat";
-char outName[]="GameStats.dat";
-
in.open(inName.c_str());
-
out.open(outName);
-
while(in>>nGames);
-
nGames=nGames>lmGames?lmGames:nGames;

Play the game the prescribed # of times:
int beg=time(0);
-
int end=time(0);

FUNCTION:
crpGame
(wins,losses,SIZE,nGames,
numThrw,mxThrw);
Page 2
Flowchart Lab

%3CmxGraphModel%3E%3Croot%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%222%22%20value%3D%22%26lt%3Bspan%20style%3D%26quot%3Bfont-size%3A%2040px%26quot%3B%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bb%26gt%3BFlowchart%20Lab%26lt%3B%2Fb%26gt%3B%26lt%3B%2Fspan%26gt%3B%22%20style%3D%22text%3Bhtml%3D1%3BstrokeColor%3Dnone%3BfillColor%3Dnone%3Balign%3Dcenter%3BverticalAlign%3Dmiddle%3BwhiteSpace%3Dwrap%3Brounded%3D0%3B%22%20vertex%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%221%22%3E%3CmxGeometry%20x%3D%224%22%20y%3D%2210%22%20width%3D%22820%22%20height%3D%22130%22%20as%3D%22geometry%22%2F%3E%3C%2FmxCell%3E%3C%2Froot%3E%3C%2FmxGraphModel%3E
Flowchart Lab
Page 2

OUTPUT RESULTS:
Total time to play these Games in
integer seconds = end-beg

FUNCTION:
scrnDsp(wins,losses,SIZE,
nGames,numThrw,mxThrw);

OUTPUT RESULTS:
Total time to play these Games in
integer seconds = end-beg

FUNCTION:
fileDsp(out,wins,losses,SIZE,
nGames,numThrw,mxThrw);

CLOSE FILES:
in.close();
out.close();

return 0;
EXIT FROM MAIN
FUNCTION: crpGame

DECLARE AND INITIALIZE IN FOR LOOP:
game = 1;
game<=nGames

DECLARING VARIABLES:
int gmThrw=1;
-
char sum1=rollDie(6);

Determine wins and losses:
switch(sum1){
case 7:
case 2:
case 11:wins[sum1]++;break;
case 3:
case 11:wins[sum1]++;break;
default:{
bool thrwAgn=true;

START OF DO-WHILE:
do{
Page 3
FUNCTION: crpGame
<font style="font-size: 12px">Page 3</font>

Throw the dice again:
char sum2=rollDie(6)

Increment the number of throws:
gmThrw++;
sum2==7
sum1==sum2

losses[sum1]++;
thrwAgn=false;

wins[sum1]++;
thrwAgn=false;
Page 4
Page 4
FUNCTION: crpGame

END OF DO-WHILE:
}while(thrwAgn);
}
}

numThrw+=gmThrw;
if(mxThrw<gmThrw)mxThrw=gmThrw;
END OF SWITCH STATEMENT
FUNCTION: fileDsp

OUTPUT:
"Total number of Games = "
"Roll Wins Losses"
int sWins=0,sLosses=0;
int sWins=0,sLosses=0;

%3CmxGraphModel%3E%3Croot%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%222%22%20value%3D%22%26lt%3Bb%26gt%3BDECLARE%20AND%20INITIALIZE%20IN%20FOR%20LOOP%3A%26lt%3B%2Fb%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bbr%26gt%3Bgame%20%3D%201%3B%22%20style%3D%22rounded%3D1%3BwhiteSpace%3Dwrap%3Bhtml%3D1%3B%22%20vertex%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%221%22%3E%3CmxGeometry%20x%3D%2272%22%20y%3D%222490%22%20width%3D%22174%22%20height%3D%22130%22%20as%3D%22geometry%22%2F%3E%3C%2FmxCell%3E%3C%2Froot%3E%3C%2FmxGraphModel%3E

DECLARE AND INITIALIZE IN FOR LOOP:
sum=2
"Total wins and losses =" Wins+sLosses

"Percentage wins = "
<<static_cast<float>(sWins)/nGames*PERCENT<<"%"<<endl;
sum<SIZE;sum++

sWins+=wins[sum];
sLosses+=losses[sum];
out<<setw(4)<<sum<<setw(10)<<wins[sum]<<setw(10)<<losses[sum]<<endl;
Page 6
FUNCTION: fileDsp
Page 6

"Percentage losses = "
 <<static_cast<float>(sLosses)/nGames*PERCENT<<"%"<<endl;
"Maximum number of throws in a game = "<<mxThrw<<endl;
"Average throw per game="<<static_cast<float>(numThrw)/nGames<<endl;
"Ratio of Longest to shortest game = 10^"<<log10(mxThrw)<<endl;
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION: scrnDsp

OUTPUT:
"Total number of Games = "
"Roll Wins Losses"
int sWins=0,sLosses=0;
int sWins=0,sLosses=0;

%3CmxGraphModel%3E%3Croot%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%220%22%2F%3E%3CmxCell%20id%3D%222%22%20value%3D%22%26lt%3Bb%26gt%3BDECLARE%20AND%20INITIALIZE%20IN%20FOR%20LOOP%3A%26lt%3B%2Fb%26gt%3B%26lt%3Bbr%26gt%3Bgame%20%3D%201%3B%22%20style%3D%22rounded%3D1%3BwhiteSpace%3Dwrap%3Bhtml%3D1%3B%22%20vertex%3D%221%22%20parent%3D%221%22%3E%3CmxGeometry%20x%3D%2272%22%20y%3D%222490%22%20width%3D%22174%22%20height%3D%22130%22%20as%3D%22geometry%22%2F%3E%3C%2FmxCell%3E%3C%2Froot%3E%3C%2FmxGraphModel%3E

DECLARE AND INITIALIZE IN FOR LOOP:
sum=2
"Total wins and losses =" Wins+sLosses

<<static_cast<float>(sWins)/nGames*PERCENT<<"%"<<endl;
sum<SIZE;sum++

sWins+=wins[sum];
sLosses+=losses[sum];

"Percentage losses = "
 <<static_cast<float>(sLosses)/nGames*PERCENT<<"%"<<endl;

FUNCTION: rollDie

ROLLING DICE:
char die1=rand()%sides+1;
char die1=rand()%sides+1;
char sum1=die1+die2;

RETURN SUM1;
END FUNCTION
